description:
Taikoubou and Sibu meet Nataku, the Paopei human. Taikoubou and Sibu get themselves in the middle of the dispute between Nataku and Lisei, Nataku`s father. Meanwhile, Dakki and Emperor Zhou hold a festival with each of the Four Lords. The  party gets crashed when the Four Lords speak their minds, which leads to two of the Four Lords to be put to death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chintoukan ni Paopei Ningen Shutsugen Su
Paopei Human Appears in Chintou Outpost
陳塘関に宝貝人間出現す
